effect.sun-moon: Inflicts regular damage. Raises the user’s Defense by one stage. User then charges for one turn before attacking. This move cannot be selected by sleep talk.
effect.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Inflicts regular damage. Raises the user’s Defense by one stage. User then charges for one turn before attacking. This move cannot be selected by sleep talk.
effect.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Inflicts regular damage. Raises the user’s Defense by one stage. User then charges for one turn before attacking. This move cannot be selected by sleep talk.

short_effect.sun-moon: Raises the user’s Defense by one stage. User charges for one turn before attacking.
short_effect.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Raises the user’s Defense by one stage. User charges for one turn before attacking.
short_effect.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Raises the user’s Defense by one stage. User charges for one turn before attacking.

flavor_text.sun-moon: The user tucks in its head to raise its Defense stat on the first turn, then rams the target on the next turn.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: The user tucks in its head to raise its Defense stat on the first turn, then rams the target on the next turn.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: The user tucks in its head to raise its Defense stat on the first turn, then rams the target on the next turn.
